Type.Name: RowCollapsedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RowCollapsedHandler(object o, RowCollapsedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed RowCollapsedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the RowCollapsedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the RowCollapsedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the RowCollapsedHandler is removed from the event.
